Text: TW ProjectI am supposed talk with Darrell some time tomorrow but was hoping to speak with you first Please let me know when you may have some time Thanks Michael

RE Slides Cc The numbers are available only in the FERC form s and they are not out yet Original Message From Howard Kevin A Sent Thursday February PM To Ratner Michael Cc Donoho Lindy Subject RE Slides Why cant we use numbers Is this due to publicly available information This package is being used for financing purposes and thus is excluded from any such limitation Kevin Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Thursday February PM To Howard Kevin A Cc Donoho Lindy Subject FW Slides Kevin what do you want to do about slide Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Wednesday February AM To Ratner Michael Subject Slides On slide as we discussed yesterday I think well have to do without the throughput numbers because the FERC Form s arent published yet for We could update the presentation when the numbers are published On slide theres a note at the bottom of Revenue What do we need here Do I need to get you a numbers

FW Slides Cc Kevin what do you want to do about slide Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Wednesday February AM To Ratner Michael Subject Slides On slide as we discussed yesterday I think well have to do without the throughput numbers because the FERC Form s arent published yet for We could update the presentation when the numbers are published On slide theres a note at the bottom of Revenue What do we need here Do I need to get you a numbers

RE Slides On slide the graph is a percent of what Is it revenue or something else Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Wednesday February AM To Ratner Michael Subject Slides On slide as we discussed yesterday I think well have to do without the throughput numbers because the FERC Form s arent published yet for We could update the presentation when the numbers are published On slide theres a note at the bottom of Revenue What do we need here Do I need to get you a numbers

RE Slide Thanks for the clarifications Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February PM To Ratner Michael Subject RE Slide You are correct Ive got my units confused the amount on slide should be MMcfd On the San Juan slide Ive left out a phrase from the report The report reads total basin wellhead production peaked in at Bcfcd and is expected to decline almost about per year to Bcfcd by In the tabular information of the study begins with MMcfd and ends with MMcfd Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Tuesday February PM To Donoho Lindy Subject RE Slide My question on slide may be an issue of units If the increase is from MMcfd to MMcfd should the increase amount be MMcfd vs MMcfd Separately on slide can you tell me how the decline is calculated If it is based on the Bcfd down to Bcfd shouldnt it be a decline Thanks Michael Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February PM To Ratner Michael Cc Harris Steven Subject Slide The note need to verify appears on this slide after the bullet MMcfd annual average increase I calculated this average annual amount from the first bullet CAs natural gas use will increase from MMcfd in to MMcfd in The first bullet and the third bullet are from the same source as the graph The California Energy Commission Specifically its from their California Natural Gas Analysis and Issues Staff Report dated November The CECs more current report from October did not include specific longterm demand projections it is focused on infrastructure issues Thats the source of the numbers on this slide

RE Slide My question on slide may be an issue of units If the increase is from MMcfd to MMcfd should the increase amount be MMcfd vs MMcfd Separately on slide can you tell me how the decline is calculated If it is based on the Bcfd down to Bcfd shouldnt it be a decline Thanks Michael Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February PM To Ratner Michael Cc Harris Steven Subject Slide The note need to verify appears on this slide after the bullet MMcfd annual average increase I calculated this average annual amount from the first bullet CAs natural gas use will increase from MMcfd in to MMcfd in The first bullet and the third bullet are from the same source as the graph The California Energy Commission Specifically its from their California Natural Gas Analysis and Issues Staff Report dated November The CECs more current report from October did not include specific longterm demand projections it is focused on infrastructure issues Thats the source of the numbers on this slide

RE Source Slide Thanks Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Ratner Michael Subject Source Slide The source for Growing Power Generation Markets pie slide is the Arizona Corporation Commission this is Arizonas PUC

RE TW PresentationThanks Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Ratner Michael Cc Zahn Gary Saunders James Howard Kevin A Subject RE TW Presentation The Total Revenue number for slide is The percentages are SoCal Texaco PGE Sempra BP Energy Duke El Paso Burlington Agave USGT Other Shippers Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Monday February PM To Watson Kimberly Zahn Gary Saunders James Cc Howard Kevin A Subject TW Presentation Attached is a draft presentation for credit agencies regarding TW Please take a look at it and provide me with your comments In particular I have designated some pages that I think you can help me with see below Please feel free to comment on the rest of the presentation too Thanks Michael Jim Saunders and Gary Zahn Kim Watson File RatingAgencyTW ppt
RE TW Map for slide Thanks Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Ratner Michael Subject TW Map for slide File TW System Mapppt
Out of Office AutoReply TW Business PlanI will be out of the office starting Monday Feb and returning Monday Feb Cheers

RE Meet on Daily Bal Report works for me Where on are you Cheers Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Thursday March PM To Ratner Michael Subject Meet on Daily Bal Report I got your message They just got my phone and computer hookedup Im on now Can you get together tomorrow How about Let me know Thanks Lindy
Meeting time Cc Instead of tomorrow how does Tuesday March at pm work for people Sorry about the delay Thanks Michael

Daily balance on TW Cc As some of you know I am working on a project for Tracy regarding the actual amount of fuel on TW that would be available to sell on any given day and coming up with a more accurate valuation for the gas I have attached a Daily Balance Report that Rich sent me for discussion purposes Please let me know if you are available to have a meeting on this on Friday March at am If the time works for people I will locate a room and let you know Thanks Michael

RE Southern Trails Project Cc I am out of town starting Tuesday afternoon but am free most of the day Monday and Tuesday am Cheers Original Message From Centilli James Sent Thursday October AM To Ratner Michael Cc Geaccone Tracy Subject Southern Trails Project Do you have some time next week to bring you up to date on the project Let Tracy and I know your availability for next week Thanks James

A friendhave attached the resume of a good friend of mine who is starting to look for a job For the last year or so he has been running his own company but prior to that he has worked in the energy business primarily in power He is trying to get a better sense of Enron better than I could tell him and I thought you would be a good person for him to speak with Please let me know if you would be willing to meet with him and I can make the arrangements Thanks Michael
Latest Draft of Purchase Agreement Cc know what you think Cheers Michael
New Address and Phone moved over the weekend to the Heights My new contact info is E Street Houston TX Tel Cheers
Oops on the zip codenew zip code is not

publications Cc a list of publications that we may want to get articles in when the time is right Both Mary and Greg can help in our efforts Michael Forwarded by Michael RatnerOTSEnron on AM on PM To Michael Ratner cc Subject publications In a message dated PM Eastern Standard Time ohnstondccom writes NALD American Indian Report Indian Country Today Okay Michael let me translate NALD is the Native American Law Digest It is published monthly and Greg has been the editorinchief for the last years It provides a synopsis of the most recent legal cases of interest to Native Americans both in tribal and nontribal courts and also runs articles Articels do not necessarily have to be on strictly legal topics The American Indian Report is also a monthly and also published by Falmouth It covers much broader issues of interest to Indian tribes as compared to the NALD Greg has a great relationship with Falmouth I also know someone over there who owes me a big favor Plus they are looking for Indian storiesand upbeat stories since many of the stories from Indian Country are downers Indian Country Today is a newspaper and I believe that it is published weekly Greg has good contacts and the writers are ALWAYS looking for interesting stories Also I know a freelancer for the Gallup NM daily paper Some consider Gallup tp be the heart of Indian Countryand five or six tribes including the Navajo are covered by the paper and read it as well I of course would put the New York Times on the list As I said I think they have two reporters trolling Indian Country particularly in the SW looking for stories of interest Although not widely read by Native Americans it is read by educated Native Americans who are involved in state and national politics as well as by Native American attorneys and other professionals Also to Native Americans live in the New York metropolitan area Also major cities with significant Native American populations which have daily newspapers Phoenix Albuquerque Denver Seattle Washington DC Also there is another magazine bimonthly Native Peoples Arts and Lifeways It casts a wide net and has included info on art food politics grants tribes have received etc This magazine is read both by Indian wannabes and Indians I also think it is read by Indians in the diasporathat is Indians far away from their tribes or from Indian culture in general Also I believe that the new Native American museum scheduled sometime in the next decade will have its own publication and will probably cast a wide net as do Native Peoples and Indian Report the museum I think was supoosed to open in and then and so I have no idea I have also just sent an email to a friend of mine who is the director of the Tribal Libraries Program at the New Mexico State Library to see if I have missed any publications of significance The State Library has a newsletter which goes out to all the tribal libraries in New Mexico and that number is I think the newsletter is published every weeks and I am sure we could have this project covered in it Also the following paragraph is an email I sent to Greg Smith this evening Is there any centralized way to find out about tribal papers I am laughing even as I write this For example I know Navajo Laguna and Hopi have newspapers Do we know of others Also do you know the name of the journal published at Cornell Isnt that about Indian education Regards Mary

Cooper Purchase Agreement Cc are closing in on my arbitrary deadline attached is the latest draft It is relatively clean as Cooper has accepted most of our suggestions Please note that Section D still needs to be reworded as it references Exhibit H which no longer exists Although most of you have not seen this document as a whole in a while your input to various sections has been very helpful and I appreciate it As time is of the essence I would be grateful for fresh eyes and perspective in what I hope will be a final read I hope to get this draft to Cooper by tomorrow morning For those prone to detail the section numbers have been changed and therefore please pay attention to references to the numbers of other sections I would not want to reference the Force Majeure section when I meant to reference the Delivery section Cheers Michael

Contract Approval Memois a contract approval memo for the purchase agreement with Cooper It may be more detailed than is common I wanted you to take a look at it before I showed it to anyone else I also was not sure who all needed to sign it Let me know what you think Thanks Michael

Bahamas LNG and associated projects Cc me know if you can make a meeting on Tuesday Dec at am to discuss the potential LNG project in the Bahamas the associated pipeline to Florida and the possible Florida power plant There may also be some revenue generating assets on the Bahamas side I will let you know the room number once I secure one For those who are not located in Houston please let me know if you are available by phone Thank you Michael

Education Dept testimonyAttached is testimony that we were asked to submit to Rod Paige Sec of Education I never heard anything from Steve Kean or his people as to whether he had any objections to this Please let me know what you think Also Lou and I spoke today about the Dec event at the Kayenta Boys Girls club He thought this might be a good thing for Stan to attend I will try to firm up details Cheers

RE Education Dept testimonyJust a submittal although there may be an actual meeting with Mr Paige Original Message From Nelson Kimberly ETS Sent Wednesday October PM To Ratner Michael Hayslett Rod Soldano Louis Chavez Gabriel Subject RE Education Dept testimony Attached are my changes and comments Michael are you going to be reading this in person or is this just to sumbit to the Dept of Education Kimberly File RatnerPaigeTestimony Kimberlys revisionsdoc

Secretary of Education Comments Cc ets Attached is the final draft of our comments to Rod Paige At Kimberlys suggestion I changed the format to a letter from testimony Do we need to run this by any one in Steve Keans group Please let me know what you think Cheers Michael

RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCartyI have not really been involved in the evaluation but will be happy to attend Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Ratner Michael Cc Howard Kevin A Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty You should plan on attending the meeting then tomorrow with Kevin Its in Stans Office Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Howard Kevin A Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty We have done an evaluation that showed our interest to be worth the following mm mm mm If you want to see the model let me know Cheers Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Howard Kevin A Cc Ratner Michael Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty They took bids and I think have an offer of about MM or so Michael What do you know about this one Original Message From Howard Kevin A Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty yes what is the deal that sounds reasonable Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Howard Kevin A Subject FW Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty Can you attend this one for me They are working on the sale of our interest in the Trailblazer Pipeline Sounds like a reasonable deal to me Message Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty

RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCartyNo problem Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Ratner Michael Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty you may need to attend for continuity reasons Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty I have not really been involved in the evaluation but will be happy to attend Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Ratner Michael Cc Howard Kevin A Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty You should plan on attending the meeting then tomorrow with Kevin Its in Stans Office Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Howard Kevin A Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty We have done an evaluation that showed our interest to be worth the following mm mm mm If you want to see the model let me know Cheers Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Howard Kevin A Cc Ratner Michael Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty They took bids and I think have an offer of about MM or so Michael What do you know about this one Original Message From Howard Kevin A Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Subject RE Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty yes what is the deal that sounds reasonable Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Howard Kevin A Subject FW Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty Can you attend this one for me They are working on the sale of our interest in the Trailblazer Pipeline Sounds like a reasonable deal to me Message Trailblazer wSHorton DMcCarty

RE Kayenta Event in DecemberShould Gabriel and I go ahead and make our plans to go out there Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November AM To Ratner Michael Subject RE Kayenta Event in December We will propose to Stan and see where we are at that time If it was this week the answer would probably be no Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Monday November PM To Hayslett Rod Cc Chavez Gabriel Subject Kayenta Event in December In light of the recent events can we still attend the event at the Kayenta Boys Girls Club This is the event that Senator McCain my be at and that we will be invited to make some remarks Lou also mentioned that it might be something for Stan to go to What do you think Cheers Michael

Kayenta Event in December Cc In light of the recent events can we still attend the event at the Kayenta Boys Girls Club This is the event that Senator McCain my be at and that we will be invited to make some remarks Lou also mentioned that it might be something for Stan to go to What do you think Cheers Michael

RE Memo regarding EnronDynegy Agreement and Plan of Merger Compliance with the Conduct of Business CovenantsWith everything going on I wanted to speak with you about some issues particularly how things may effect my group In light of the attached memo it does not seem that we can do anything that will cost the company more than mm What does this mean for what we are looking at Can Enron even participate in the Arctic project as a mm commitment will not including the potential additional liabilities commit the company for more than mm I guess you can make an argument about it depends upon how you count it Anyway please let me know when you have some time Cheers Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Saturday November PM To Brassfield Morris Saunders James Geaccone Tracy Gilbert Steve Keiser John Barnes Caroline Ratner Michael Peters Jerry Rosenberg David E Tu Denis Centilli James Daily Pamela Subject FW Memo regarding EnronDynegy Agreement and Plan of Merger Compliance with the Conduct of Business Covenants Importance High Sensitivity Confidential FYI Original Message From Walls Jr Rob Sent Sat PM To Horton Stanley Hayslett Rod Cc Subject FW Memo regarding EnronDynegy Agreement and Plan of Merger Compliance with the Conduct of Business Covenants Original Message From Keesler Martha On Behalf Of Del vecchio Peter Sent Friday November PM To Ale John Cheek Charles Derrick Jr James Evans Mark London Legal Fossum Drew Haedicke Mark E Labanowski Elizabeth Mintz Jordan Newell Eric Rogers Rex Sharp Vicki Wallace Stephen Walls Jr Rob Tweed Sheila Hodge Jeffrey T Sager Elizabeth Cash Michelle Butcher Sharon Taylor Mark E Legal Gray Barbara N Murray Julia Aronowitz Alan Rogers Daniel R Lundstrom Bruce Novak John Henry Joseph Eickenroht Robert Donahue Jeff Muller Mark S Sample Molly Place Janet Cc Del vecchio Peter Subject Memo regarding EnronDynegy Agreement and Plan of Merger Compliance with the Conduct of Business Covenants Importance High Sensitivity Confidential Please see the attached memo regarding EnronDynegy Agreement and Plan of Merger Compliance with the Conduct of Business Covenants Sent on behalf of Peter del Vecchio By Martha Keesler Senior Administrative Assistant Enron North America Corp Smith EB Houston Texas Fax CovenantComplianceMemoDOC

OneokAttached is a preliminary model based on the K I broke it out by segment so we could see what each piece is valued I was not sure what to use as salvage multiples The Other sheet contains something called eliminations which I am not sure about Also I was trying to follow Yuans levered page and had some questions when you have some time Michael

PGT Cc Rod suggested I contact you to see what if anything we want to do on PGT I attached the latest unlevered model Please let me know what next steps you want to take or is the price out of our range Thanks Michael
Goals and AccomplishmentsI have listed some bullet points for the review process Cheers

Jewish HolidaysNext Tuesday is Rosh Hashana I would like to take off next Monday and Tuesday if that is okay The following Thursday is Yom Kippur so I will also need to take off Sept Please let me know if this is okay Thanks Michael
VacationI do not recall if I asked you about this previously but in case I did not I would like to take Aug and Aug off Please let me know if that is a problem Thanks Michael
SnowmobilesDont forget
Generic modelAs I mentioned not all the pages are hooked up but the Pipeline pages should be okay
Contact listThanks

RE TW Retained GasSounds good Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Friday March AM To Ratner Michael Subject RE TW Retained Gas It will be sometime on Tuesday Just call ds Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Friday March AM To Schoolcraft Darrell Subject RE TW Retained Gas Please let me know when you will have some time next week Thanks Michael Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Thursday March PM To Ratner Michael Subject RE TW Retained Gas yes ds Original Message From Ratner Michael Sent Thursday March PM To Schoolcraft Darrell Subject RE TW Retained Gas Will you be in the rest of the week Original Appointment From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Thursday March PM To Ratner Michael Subject Declined TW Retained Gas When Tuesday March PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where EB A I will be on vacation tuesday March returning on wednesday ds

TW Presentation Cc Attached is a draft presentation for credit agencies regarding TW Please take a look at it and provide me with your comments In particular I have designated some pages that I think you can help me with see below Please feel free to comment on the rest of the presentation too Thanks Michael Jim Saunders and Gary Zahn Kim Watson
